resources.string: Alarm set for %1$d Minute from now
Alarm set for %1$d Minutes from now
Alarm set for %1$d Hour, and %2$d Minutes from now
Alarm set for %1$d Hours, and %2$d Minutes from now
Alarm set for %1$d Day, %2$d Hours, and %3$d Minutes from now
Alarm set for %1$d Days, %2$d Hours, and %3$d Minutes from now
You need to choose at least one weekday

string-array.name: author_list
string-array.item: Anne, Redakteurin, Kulturmanagerin und Nachtigall, singt gerne nachts, findet den Morgen grauselig und ist gern auf Wanderschaft
Maria Sigal, Studentin der Informatik und Bülbül Vogel, mag essen und schlafen
Stephanie Weber, User Experience Designer, liebt die Farben und Geräusche exotischer Vögel genauso wie den bunten Geschmack kolumbianischer Früchte
David Gómez, kolumbianischer Grafikdesigner, ist schon durch viele Orte der Welt geflogen und zwitschert seit einem Jahr aus Hamburg
Simon, Student der Informatik, Hobby Freiberufler und Seeadler, bei der Beobachtung trinkt er gerne auch mal ein Bier und gleitet gerne über die Meere

string-array.name: credentials_list
string-array.item: Birdcalls provide by "Museum für Naturkunde" Berlin (Creative Commons (CC BY-SA 3.0))
Abstracts come from Wikipedia and was loaded with DBpedia
Eagle owl is from Softeis. The picture is under license Creative-Commons-License 3.0
Bluethroat is from Bogomolov.PL. The picture is under license Creative-Commons-License 3.0
Woodlark is from Rodrigo de Almeida. The picture is under license Creative-Commons-License 2.0
Little Owl is from Arturo Nikolai. The picture is under license Creative-Commons-License 2.0
Golden Oriole is from Dixi. The picture is under license Creative-Commons-License 3.0
Whooper Swan is from Andreas Trepte. The picture is under license Creative Commons Attribution-Share Alike 2.5 Generic
Redstart is from Debot. The picture is under license Creative Commons Attribution-Share Alike 3.0 Unported
Nightingale is from J. Dietrich. The picture is under license Creative Commons Attribution-Share Alike 3.0 Unported
Herring Gull is from Kulac. The picture is under license Creative Commons Attribution-Share Alike 2.5 Generic
Willow Warbler is from Andreas Trepte. The picture is under license Creative Commons Attribution-Share Alike 2.5 Generic
Goldfinch is from Pierre Dalous. The picture is under license Creative Commons Attribution-Share Alike 3.0 Unported
Tree Sparrow is from Laitche. The picture is under license Public domain
Yellowhammer is from Alan Vernon. The picture is under license Creative Commons Attribution 2.0 Generic
Chiffchaff is from Hans Hillewaert. The picture is under license Creative Commons Attribution-Share Alike 3.0 Unported
Greylag Goose is from H005. The picture is under license Public domain
Jay is from Luc Viatour. The picture is under license Creative Commons Attribution-Share Alike 3.0 Unported
Great Spotted Woodpecker is from Steffen Hannert. The picture is under license Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported
Coot is from Noodle snacks. The picture is under license Creative Commons Attribution-Share Alike 3.0 Unported
Robin is from PierreSelim. The picture is under license Creative Commons Attribution-Share Alike 3.0 Unported
Grey Heron is from JJ Harrison. The picture is under license Creative Commons Attribution-Share Alike 3.0 Unported
Buzzard is from Arend. The picture is under license Creative Commons Attribution 2.0 Generic
Carrion Crow is from BS Thurner Hof. The picture is under license Creative Commons Attribution-Share Alike 3.0 Unported
Wood Pigeon is from Tristan Ferne. The picture is under license Creative Commons Attribution 2.0 Generic
House Martin is from Ómar Runólfsson. The picture is under license Creative Commons Attribution 2.0 Generic
Chaffinch is from Andreas Trepte. The picture is under license Creative Commons Attribution-Share Alike 2.5 Generic
Crane is from Marek Szczepanek. The picture is under license Creative Commons Attribution-Share Alike 3.0 Unported
Great Tit is from Luc Viatour. The picture is under license Creative Commons Attribution-Share Alike 3.0 Unported
Great Cormorant is from Miya. The picture is under license Creative Commons Attribution-Share Alike 3.0 Unported
Magpie is from Teemu Lehtinen. The picture is under license Creative Commons Attribution 2.0 Generic
Kestrel is from Andreas Trepte. The picture is under license Creative Commons Attribution-Share Alike 2.5 Generic

string-array.name: privacy_list
string-array.item: The App sends after a Alarm to www.farbtrommel.de following data:
Wake-up time
Duration
Number of tries
Possible answers
Right answer
All collected data are published under www.farbtrommel.de.
